Name: VR World of Pandas
About the game: Based on 3D and VR technology, it simulates and restores panda models and pandas' daily behaviors, allowing visitors to immersely watch pandas and other cute animals through VR. Watch and experience in the VR scene. Watch all kinds of cute and childlike animals at close range. The scene includes lawns, trees, water sources and other elements of the scene interactive experience area. In the virtual scene, the player can move and walk, or instantly in the virtual scene Move to the specified location. game operation The touchpad of the left handle controls the movement forward and backward, left and right, Right handle cursor to select
